name: Basis Retriever
short_description:
News: BasisRetriever v0.5 Released.

 This version fixes several bugs and cleans up the user interface. Simplified updating of advanced configuration items in BasisRetriever.cfg file.

What it does: Retrieve the biometric data you recorded on your Basis Peak or B1 fitness watch (which Basis automatically uploads to their servers at app.mybasis.com).  This application downloads the data from the Basis website, converts it to csv, and stores it on your hard drive.

BasisRetriever is a portable application. Just download extract the zip file to wherever you please.
summary: Download your data from mybasis.com, store it on your hard drive.
